injectors.label: Remove Curtains
injectors.promptFragment: Remove all curtains, drapes, and window treatments. Leave windows bare, showing only the window frames.

injectors.label: Remove Blinds
injectors.promptFragment: Remove all blinds and shades from windows. Leave windows bare, showing only the window frames.

injectors.label: Remove Rugs
injectors.promptFragment: Remove all rugs and floor coverings. Reveal the underlying floor surface completely.

injectors.label: Remove Wall Art
injectors.promptFragment: Remove all wall art, paintings, photographs, mirrors, and wall decorations. Leave walls clean and bare.

injectors.label: Remove Visible Cables
injectors.promptFragment: Remove all visible cables, cords, and wires. Clean up any cable clutter.

injectors.label: Remove Plants
injectors.promptFragment: Remove all plants, both real and artificial, including potted plants, hanging plants, and vases with flowers.

injectors.label: Remove Ceiling Fans
injectors.promptFragment: Remove ceiling fans but preserve any other ceiling light fixtures.

injectors.label: Keep Built-in Furniture
injectors.promptFragment: Preserve all built-in furniture such as built-in wardrobes, shelving units, and cabinetry. Only remove freestanding furniture.

injectors.label: Keep Window Treatments
injectors.promptFragment: Preserve all existing curtains, blinds, and window treatments exactly as shown.

injectors.label: Remove Personal Items
injectors.promptFragment: Remove all personal items including family photos, personal collections, toiletries, and any items that identify the occupants.
